version_description: This release welcomes some improvements under the hood, alongside some general bug fixes that will make your Revolut Junior experience so much slicker! Get ready for more good stuff, heading your way soon.

This release welcomes some improvements under the hood, alongside some general bug fixes that will make your Revolut Junior experience so much slicker! Get ready for more good stuff, heading your way soon.
Welcome to Revolut Junior 1.2.2. With this update, the app is now available in 28 languages.

Boost your earnings with Revolut Junior 2.2!

This release introduces our new Tasks feature. Chat to your parents about doing some work around the house for a little extra cash. Once done, just tick off your tasks in the app and we'll let your parents know it's time to pay up!

This release welcomes some improvements under the hood, alongside some general bug fixes that will make your Revolut Junior experience so much slicker! Get ready for more good stuff, heading your way soon.

Achieve your Goals with Revolut Junior 2.3!

This release introduces our new Goals feature. Create Goals and save towards the things you want! Whether it's a new gadget, a school trip or something special, set targets and watch your progress with Goals.

This release welcomes some improvements under the hood, alongside some general bug fixes that will make your Revolut Junior experience so much slicker! Get ready for more good stuff, heading your way soon.

Edit your Goals with Revolut Junior 2.5!
This release gives you the freedom to edit your Goals after they've been created. Change your Goal's name, the target amount and update your custom cover anytime!

Celebrate your Goals with Revolut Junior 2.6
This release lets you celebrate achieving your Goals. Every time you complete a Goal, take a moment to celebrate it with your parents. Happy saving!

This release welcomes some improvements under the hood, alongside some general bug fixes that will make your Revolut Junior experience so much slicker! Get ready for more good stuff, heading your way soon.

This release welcomes some improvements under the hood, alongside some general bug fixes that will make your Revolut Junior experience so much slicker! Get ready for more good stuff, heading your way soon.

Bring on the whole family with Revolut Junior 2.8
This release allows you to boost your earnings with an added Co-Parent. Kerching! Your Co-Parent can add allowances, set tasks and add Goals.

We’ve updated our designs to give you an improved, easy to use experience.
• New home screen with account balance
• Quick link to your transactions from home screen
• Summary with quick links to Goals & Tasks from home screen
• New section for managing your Junior Cards
